short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab extension for Chrome designed to improve productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate is a new tab extension for Chrome that can help you improve productivity.

Current features:
- Current weather and forecast information
- Beautiful, customizable hourly background images from Unsplash
- Task list and notes
- Clock in 12 and 24 hour time
- Pomodoro timer
- Customizable - any of these features can be hidden 

Planned features:
 - Sync support across multiple devices
 - Support across more photo sharing sites (just Unsplash right now)
 - 3rd party integrations

Permissions:
- Location is for weather and forecast
- Notifications are for Pomodoro timer
